name: CZRed
description: CZR is a BEP-20 limited supply ecosystem token with deflationary tokenomics using CZodiac FairTribe technology. This FairTribe technology can provide an increase in the value of the token and the reward for staking with BurnPay. The goal of the CZodiac project is to increase the number of quality-controlled deliverables available to consumers through blockchain payments. CZodiac Defi investment bank provides liquidity for new products and services, including NFT games, project tokens, stable coins and others.
